remarks: Reversed double substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.)  Remove variable constraints. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 28-Sep-2018.)
statement:
2sb5rf.1 $e |- F/ z ph $.
2sb5rf.2 $e |- F/ w ph $.
2sb6rf $p |- ( ph <-> A. z A. w ( ( z = x /\ w = y ) -> [ z / x ] [ w / y ] ph ) ) $.
$d w z $.
